Description: Square inlay with circular inset: a square for inlay in opaque dark-blue glass with central circular depression. Inlaid in this is an eight-petal rosette in opaque white glass, each petal framed in bronze. The interstices are inlaid with dark-red glass on a bed of resin. From a naos.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Temple of Hathor (Dendara), Temple of Hathor
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.61)
